name: Epic Summoners 2
description:
Fresh graphics, integrative skills, auto battle, an all-new high quality RPG project, "Epic Summoners 2" is officially here!

For this new "Epic Summoners 2", we used a low poly style of graphics, added more new story lines and developed more integrative skills, ensuring to give you an all new fresh gaming experience.

Features of this fresh idle RPG game

Creative and Integrative skills
Your heroes can now interact with you, now work together with them to release skills, eliminating those boring battles!

While your set hero is in battle, try and activate his/her integrative skills. These new integrative skills are sure to make your gaming experience more exciting!

Easy and fun game
Your heroes can now battle for you automatically and you can obtain a mountain of rewards anytime anywhere!
A simple game with endless strategy combinations, that can be enjoyed anytime anywhere!

Ample amounts of rewards are obtainable even offline, giving you more freedom to live your life without constantly getting interrupted by your game!

Infinite amount possible strategies
5 star heroes are easily obtainable, making it less troublesome to collect heroes!

Use hundreds of different heroes, with different integrative skills, and play with a real battle formation!
Collect and refine equipment, match them up to create your own unique suit, allowing your powers to shine!

Amazing and rich abundance of game content
Dragon Towers, Magic Cubes, Spirt Book Libraries and Parties!
Configure, Battle, Collect, Refine, Achieve!

A huge amount of military campaign methods with vivid story lines is now here. Let’s go take down evil together!

High Quality Audio-Visual Feast
Unique and original appearances of heroes and skill effects!
Powers are now even greater, once unlocked the animation of the all new skills will simply blow you away!


Magnificently refined gaming background!
Carefree easy-going battle tempo with vivid sound effects!

Global showdowns with player from all around the world

Join the Arena and battle with world’s best!
Challenge the top ranked, use your power and strategy to crush your opponent!
Win luxurious rewards and earn your long awaited honor!
